Plop the Growables: Автоматически блокировать уровень вручную размещенного здания, пока активна эта настройка.
Prevents buildings from becoming abandoned. This does NOT affect any buildings that are already abandoned.
Предотвращает изменение уровня ВСЕХ зданий, тем самым сохраняя их внешний вид.
Lock building levels for all existing buildings
Immediately apply level locking to all existing growable buildings.  This does NOT affect any buildings placed or spawned after this button is pressed.
Unlock building levels for all existing buildings
Immediately remove level locking from all existing growable buildings.  This does NOT affect any buildings placed or spawned after this button is pressed.
Remove abandonment from all existing buildings
Immediately remove abandonment from all existing growable buildings.  This does NOT affect any buildings placed or spawned after this button is pressed.
Если этот параметр установлен, то здание не сможет менять уровни и, следовательно, сохранит свой внешний вид неизменным.
